website_summaries.verdict: Athletic take on the slip-on loafer in microsuede and mesh.
pros: Perfect for anyone who is on their feet all day
Memory foam and gel cushion on the heel help with foot and ankle pain
cons: Some found the top zipper too tight to close

customer_reviews.title: Heel feels a bit odd, but very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I went on the advice of various commenters, and order these in a 9. I typically wear an 8.5. They're definitely too big for me. My heel tends to slide out whenever I take a step. On the plus side though, they were very comfy in the insoles. The heel is slightly odd the way it's constructed, so it feels a bit weird when I stand in them, but I suspect that's something I'd get used to. Overall, they're not exactly what I was looking for, so I'm still debating whether I'll return or exchange. Either way, they are definitely comfortable and I'd probably remind them to anyone who's on their feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Denise N.

customer_reviews.title: The size runs small. I ordered a size larger and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I can wear these shoes all day long in comfort! I love them. Great for shopping and running errands. I bought a pair in my regular size and they were too small. They fit my daughter who wears a size smaller than me just fine. I gave them to her and ordered another pair one size larger for me and they are just right.
customer_reviews.author: morrison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery, beautiful shoes, very comfortable. Love the zipper closure.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Tom

customer_reviews.title: I love them so much I ordered a second pair for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them so much I ordered a second pair for the future!! Really tailored and cool look as well as absolutely the most comfortable footwear anywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: hayes

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I ever got
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I ever got. supports my ankles and hips when I wear these I have no pain. I ordered an extra pair so I always have them. That how good they are
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Dr Scholl’s women’s
customer_reviews.text: Light, super comfortable as I have a verily high arch. Insple removal if another ortho ic type insole is needed. I ordered a 7M, as I am anywhere from a 61/2 to 7. Like plenty of room in the toe box. Love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: but the 91/2 fit me great! I’m confused though as to why there was ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear 81/2 9, but the 91/2 fit me great! I’m confused though as to why there was such a big jump in the price. I wanted to buy another pair but I can’t anymore because the price almost doubled in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Anarchel

customer_reviews.title: Please make wide width shoes
customer_reviews.text: would have been a great pair for me but not wide enough to close the zipper. wish they’d make shoes for wider feet. in the end, i had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super comfy! I wear them at work in a ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfy! I wear them at work in a lab to avoid damaging my nicer shoes. Highly recommend for someone on their feet/looking for an affordable pair of shoes for work.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered a size larger
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great and they fit well. I am however glad I ordered a size lager than my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn LeClair

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable. They were snug at first
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable. They were snug at first. Then the memory foam adjusted to my feet and they are a dream. The curve of the sole makes you just want to keep on walking. I need to order more :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary I

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'd order them in every color if they made them - they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Burrows

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit. These shoes are so comfortable with lots ...
customer_reviews.text: I order one size up, perfect fit. These shoes are so comfortable with lots of support. I stand a lot for work, they make a difference in my energy level. I highly recommend these shoes, will be purchasing another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Eve

customer_reviews.title: They look nice and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my feet all day long! They look nice and are very comfortable! I’ve given them as gifts for young and old due to support and style.
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: Shoes with good foot support for mild back pain
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and good heal support for those with a mild back pain. Dressy looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Felt great as soon as I put them on. Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I’m able to wear them all day long.
customer_reviews.author: church lady 1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: the shoe is true to size, Comfortable out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: NiNi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes!! Fit perfectly and adds support to the back. I highly recommend to anyone who deals with back siotic nerve problems and or stands on their feet for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Going to try exchange for larger size but I think after that the should be great
customer_reviews.author: terry pace

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these loafers. I was skeptical about the zipper but it's actually a nice feature. They fit better than most any shoes I own and look great with dress pants for work and with black jeans for casual. They also make my size 10 foot look more like an 8 1/2! The gel insole makes them a great walking shoe. I'm very happy with these and expect to buy another pair after the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: GrierL

product_meta.title: Dr. Scholl's Shoes Women's Wondrous Slip-On Loafer
product_meta.description: Sporty details make this a style standout. get athletic inspired detailing in an everyday shoe that takes you through your busy day. microsuede and mesh upper. gel cushion at heel. front zip for easy fit. lightweight, cushioned soles.
